item.description: We are going to standout for Christmas at the entrance to the Hampshire Mall in Hadley. It is a prime location for this event. There are two entrances to the Mall, The first is closest to the set of lights on Route 9, and the second is located a little further down across from the shopping plaza. It has a Walmart, Barnes and Noble, Whole Foods, and other large retail stores. There are large grassy areas close to the street that will give us a safe place to stand out as well as high visibility. Plenty of parking as well. Let's get together and bring our "WE SAY MERRY CHRISTMAS MESSAGE" to Hadley.
item.name: Merry Christmas Super Rally
